Title: Brad Mehldau releases Art of the Trio Volume 3
Description: Highlights his innovative approach to jazz piano trio format.

Title: Diana Krall’s The Look of Love released
Description: Achieves commercial success, blending jazz and pop.

Title: Esperanza Spalding releases debut album Junjo
Description: Marks the start of her rise as a jazz bassist and vocalist.

Title: John Zorn founds The Stone
Description: An influential avant-garde jazz performance venue in NYC.

Title: Robert Glasper releases debut album Mood
Description: Begins blending jazz with hip-hop and R&B influences.

Title: Kamasi Washington begins gaining recognition
Description: Emerges as a leading figure in modern jazz and fusion.

Title: Norah Jones releases Not Too Late
Description: Continues blending jazz, pop, and folk styles to critical acclaim.

Title: Esperanza Spalding releases Esperanza
Description: Wins Grammy for Best New Artist in 2011, bringing jazz to broader audiences.

Title: Pat Metheny releases Quartet
Description: Features collaborations with jazz legends and younger musicians.

Title: Kamasi Washington releases The Epic
Description: A landmark triple album blending jazz, gospel, and hip-hop influences.
